```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(viridis)
library(dplyr)
library(gganimate)
```

## Assignment 2 - Scatter Plot with ggplot

```{r}
data <- read.csv("penglings.csv")
data <- data[!is.na(data$body_mass_g), ]
```



```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
p <-ggplot(data, aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, color = species)) +
  geom_point(aes(size = bill_length_mm), alpha = 0.6) +
  scale_color_viridis_d() +
  transition_time(year) +
  labs(title = 'Year: {frame_time}', x = 'Flipper Length (mm)', y = 'Body Mass (g)',
        subtitle = "Illustrating changes in body mass and flipper length by species") +
  theme_minimal()

# Create the animation
anim <- p + ease_aes('linear')

# Save the animation
anim_save("penguin_growth_over_time.gif", animation = anim)

```
